title: Roast wild goose
ingredients: ['1 wild goose, skinned', '100g cold butter, cubed', '100g fresh cranberries', '100g raisins', '50g dried currants', 'zest of 1 orange', '1 tablespoon dried herbs', '1 bay leaf, broken into bits', '1 teaspoon minced garlic', '450g bacon', '1 onion, chopped', '1 apple, quartered', 'salt and pepper, to taste']
